input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
#CB2-S3 Celebrity Eyewear Rhinestones Accents Cat Eyes Women's Sunglasses

Item keywords:
Welcome to Nick Nack Mart. Proudly offering 10000+ pair of Designer Inspired Sunglasses!
We offer 100% Authentic Celebrity Eyewear Sunglasses.
Genuine Factory Direct New in Mint Condition.
Each pair of sunglasses offers maximum UV400 protection.
Please Do Not remove the Tag. Please try sunglasses on to ensure proper fit first. 14 days merchandise exchange guarantee.
USPS Standard Shipping Monday thru Friday 8AM-12PM. Guarantee delivery within 3 5 business days. We do not ship on Weekends and Holidays.  We Do Not offer any forms of Expedited Shipping.
Makes for an ideal gift. Thank you kindly for your valued purchase consideration.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: These sunglasses are worn by many celebrities!  They are very fashionable and will help you look great.  They have fancy decorations on the sides, and will protect your eyes from the sun.
input_text.Response B: Ooh, these sunglasses are so cool! 😎 They're just like the ones your favorite celebrities wear! 💃🕺 The rhinestones and cat eyes make them look super fancy and stylish. 💅 You'll feel like a star when you wear them! 🌟 They even have UV protection to keep your eyes safe from the sun. ☀️ And, they come in a fancy box with a tag, so you can give them as a gift or keep them for yourself. 🎁👀 So, which color do you like best? 🤔

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.factors_b: Hallucinates- the prompt never states the glasses come with a box.
